channel.title: jGRASP
channel.description:
Hello everyone. For first, no need to flame, I'm just contributing this. It`s good because you can code and compile in the same time, it's way better and this helps me alot. After you compile, you can run it so you`ll see if your codes actually work.
Here's how does it work. I won't be explaining everything about this program because I'm new to it.
Open your .java file [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg839/scaled.php?server=839&filename=fileopenjgrasp.png&res=medium[/img]
You can add line Numbers, you can generate your CPG, you can make a Diagram Click on the Green "+" button to Compile your file, generate and remove CSD and much more. [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg801/scaled.php?server=801&filename=compilefile.png&res=medium[/img]
This is how will it look after compiling, and it will show up your errors. [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg689/scaled.php?server=689&filename=compileproblem.png&res=medium[/img]
To run, click on the Red "man" running I guess lol [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg651/scaled.php?server=651&filename=runjgrrasp.png&res=medium[/img]
And this is what you will get as result. [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg849/scaled.php?server=849&filename=hellomoparscapecommunit.png&res=medium[/img]
Remember, I'm only contributing this, so if someone find this good, use it, if not, no need to flame.
I do not own this program.
Download Link: [ftp=ftp://spider.eng.auburn.edu/user-cgi/grasp/grasp.pl?;dl=download_jgrasp.html]http://spider.eng.auburn.edu/user-cgi/grasp/grasp.pl?;dl=download_jgrasp.html[/ftp]

item.title: jGRASP
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“str2own99, post:4, topic:412145”][quote author=I Roll Deep link=topic=513396.msg3727444#msg3727444 date=1314381618]

And, you made this? Why not use eclipse, can compiles also while coding. If you made this, wich I doubt, good job.

I’ve didn’t made this, I just though this is going to help someone from the community.
[/quote]moust people use eclipse but oh well thanks for the share.[/quote]
I found this easier to use then eclipse so… np

Read full topic

item.title: jGRASP
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

Hello everyone. For first, no need to flame, I’m just contributing this. Its good because you can code and compile in the same time, it's way better and this helps me alot. After you compile, you can run it so youll see if your codes actually work.

Here’s how does it work. I won’t be explaining everything about this program because I’m new to it.

Open your .java file

You can add line Numbers, you can generate your CPG, you can make a Diagram
Click on the Green “+” button to Compile your file, generate and remove CSD and much more.

This is how will it look after compiling, and it will show up your errors.

To run, click on the Red “man” running I guess lol

And this is what you will get as result.

Remember, I’m only contributing this, so if someone find this good, use it, if not, no need to flame.

I do not own this program.

Download Link: [ftp=ftp://spider.eng.auburn.edu/user-cgi/grasp/grasp.pl?;dl=download_jgrasp.html]http://spider.eng.auburn.edu/user-cgi/grasp/grasp.pl?;dl=download_jgrasp.html[/ftp]
